TopicTitle: You cannot delete or hide the stock craft files

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.3.2 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 11 | CPU: 11th Gen Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-11700F @ 2.5GHz | GPU: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 | RAM: 32 GB

 

There is no way to delete or hide the stock craft files. You can open the craft list, select a stock craft, click delete, and then confirm you want to delete the craft but the craft will still be there. There is also no option to hide autosaved crafts. Both of these just clutter up the craft list and need options to hide.
